@Version(value="1.0.0")

Package uk.co.strangeskies.utilities.text

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractParser<T>
    A partial implementation of Parser with sensible default behaviour provided for a large number of methods.
    LocaleManager
    Management interface over and associate localiser instance, allowing the locale of that instance to be changed.
    LocaleProvider
    Management interface over and associate localiser instance, allowing the locale of that instance to be changed.
    LocalizedString
    A localised string interface which is observable over the string data changes due to updated locale.
    LocalizedText<S extends LocalizedText<S>>
    A super-interface for fetching localised text items.
    Localizer
    This interface represents a simple but powerful system for internationalisation.
    LocalizerText
    A LocalizedText interface to provide localized texts for use by the Localizer class itself, such as for reporting errors for improperly structured localisation classes, etc.
    Parser<T>
    A simple, composable, type-safe text parser.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppendingParser<T,U>  
    ChoiceParser<U,T>  
    JoiningParser<T,U,V>  
    LocalizationResource
    A class loader and base name location referring to a unique localisation resource.
    LocalizationTextDelegate<T extends LocalizedText<T>>
    Delegate implementation object for proxy instances of LocalizationText classes.
    LocalizedResourceBundle
    A resource bundle with a configurable locale
    ParseResult<T>  
    ParserProxy<U,T>  
    ParseState  
    PrependingParser<T,U>  
    RegexParser<T>  
    StringEscaper
    Allow the escape of special characters in a character sequence by prefixture with a given special escape character.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LocalizationException
    Exception relating to localisation.
    LocalizedException
    A localized exception class.
    LocalizedRuntimeException
    A localised runtime exception class.
    ParseException  
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    LocalizedError
    A localized error class.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AppendToLocalizationKey
    Annotation for parameters of methods in sub-interfaces of LocalizedText to specify string to append to property key for resource delegation.
    LocalizationKey
    Annotation for instance methods of sub-interfaces of LocalizedText to specify property key for resource delegation.
